name: Jira Task Indenter
description: Allows for hierarchal indenting of stories/tasks and sub-tasks under Epics in search lists in Jira, and for displaying task numbers in the sub-task view under a story
additional_info:
You can achieve a Confluence like hierarchal project view without the exorbitant cost by doing the following:

1. Canonically name the summaries of your epics, stories/tasks and sub-task like so:

Epic
Epic - StoryName1
Epic - StoryName1 - SubTask1
Epic - StoryName1 - SubTask2
Epic - Task1
Epic - Bug1
Epic - StoryName2
Epic - StoryName2 - SubTask2

2. Order your order your JQL search lists as follows:
"project = XYZ AND resolution in (Your resolution(s)) ORDER BY SUMMARY ASC, key ASC"
